name: Taito Memories Pocket
overview: A compilation of Taito's retro games comes to the handheld market in Taito Memories Pocket. All the games have some changes like the total number of levels in Carry Balloon has been increased from 50 to 100 and special items that make the balloon small, fast, slow, and invincible. 20 games in all, 16 retro games from the 80s and 4 remakes: Crazy Balloon + Crazy Balloon 2005 Balloon Bomber + Balloon Bomber 2005 Lunar Rescue Qix Alpine Ski Elevator Action Chack n' Pop Legend of Kage + Legend of Kage 2005 Fairyland Story Kiki Kaikai Ninja Rastan Saga Kuri Kinton New Zealand Story Ramais Rainbow Islands Extra Cameltry + Cameltry 2005
